mapper.update: UPDATE teacher_absence SET absence_end = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s') WHERE absence_no = #{absenceNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher_absence ( attendance_no, license_kindergarten, category_no, absence_start, absence_day) VALUES ( #{attendanceNo}, #{licenseKindergarten}, '1', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select teacher_absence.absence_no AS absenceNo, teacher_absence.attendance_no AS attendanceNo, teacher_absence.category_no AS categoryNo, teacher_absence.absence_start AS absenceStart, teacher_absence.absence_end AS absenceEnd, teacher_absence.absence_day AS absenceDay from teacher_absence inner join teacher_attendance on teacher_attendance.attendance_no = teacher_absence.attendance_no and teacher_attendance.attendance_no = #{teacherNo}

select teacher_attendance.attendance_no AS attendanceNo, teacher_attendance.license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten, teacher_attendance.attendance_start AS attendanceStart, teacher_attendance.attendance_end AS attendanceEnd, teacher.teacher_name AS teacherName from teacher_attendance inner join teacher where teacher.teacher_no = teacher_attendance.teacher_no and teacher_attendance.attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and teacher.teacher_no = #{teacherNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher_attendance ( teacher_no, license_kindergarten, attendance_start, attendance_day )VALUES ( #{teacherNo}, #{licenseKindergarten}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher_attendance SET attendance_end=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s') WHERE teacher_no=#{teacherNo} and attendance_day=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.select: select teacher_attendance.attendance_no AS attendanceNo, teacher_attendance.teacher_no AS teacherNo, teacher_attendance.attendance_start AS attendanceStart, teacher_attendance.attendance_end AS attendanceEnd, teacher_attendance.attendance_day AS attendanceDay, teacher_absence.absence_no AS absenceNo, teacher_absence.category_no AS categoryNo, teacher_absence.absence_start AS absenceStart, teacher_absence.absence_end AS absenceEnd from teacher_attendance left join teacher_absence on teacher_attendance.attendance_no = teacher_absence.attendance_no where teacher_attendance.license_kindergarten = #{license} and teacher_attendance.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and teacher_attendance.attendance_day > #{startDay} and teacher_attendance.attendance_day < (SELECT LAST_DAY(#{startDay}));
